review: Great physics engine and graphics. The AI crashes into you waaaaay to much.

Everything I was looking forward to. Great gameplay, level system and graphics. You'll need a beast of a GPU to play this on ultra, even at 1080p.***A year on:Still no full release. It's disappointing really. Limited guns, perks and maps have turned many players away. I'd only buy if it's on sale.
Excellent. One of the top RPGs I've ever played.
